doctor.name: Dr. Ishtiaq Mosharraf
doctor.workplace: National Institute of Kidney Diseases & Urology
doctor.info: Dr. Ishtiaq Mosharraf is a Kidney Specialist in Pabna. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Nephrology). He is working as a Kidney Specialist doctor in National Institute of Kidney Diseases & Urology. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Shimla Hospital, Pabna. Practicing hour of Dr. Ishtiaq Mosharraf at Shimla Hospital, Pabna is 8am to 4pm (Only Friday).

chamber.address: Shimla Tower, Thana Mor, Hospital Road, Pabna

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Moniruzzaman (Monir)
doctor.workplace: Shaheed M. Monsur Ali Medical College, Sirajganj
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Moniruzzaman (Monir) is a Nephrologist in Pabna. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Nephrology. He is a Consultant (Nephrology) at Shaheed M. Monsur Ali Medical College, Sirajganj. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Labaid Diagnostic, Pabna. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Moniruzzaman (Monir) at Labaid Diagnostic, Pabna is 10am to 4pm (Every Friday).

chamber.address: Beside Joy Kali Bari, Thana Road, Shalgaria, Pabna
